ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve been everywhere hon!    Have drum, will travel. God, I hope no one got offended by me teasing you, hehe. I ll have to qualify every statement with
ygData.messageBody:
> Just so everyone who is not on Innoruuk server knows - Harm and me are old
> pals. So, when he says them things - he's making a funny. Ands I laff too.
> I do have a bad rep for getting lost but it's usually in places that old
> Harm not been to yet ;p

I've been everywhere hon! <g> Have drum, will travel.

God, I hope no one got offended by me teasing you, hehe.
I'll have to qualify every statement with a (j/k) at this rate ;P
Or I'll have to put IMHO on every bold comment. <smirk>

Harmonic.
